testcase.classname: 01 user can logout with new account
testcase.name: user can log out with new account
testcase.system-out: And click at Register link..................................................passed When user enter valid mandatory personal details............................passed And user enter vaild Password...............................................passed And user click in register button...........................................passed Then user register with valid account.......................................passed

testcase.classname: 02 User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user can login in with vaild data
testcase.system-out: And user click in login.....................................................passed When user enter valid email and Password....................................passed And user click on button log in.............................................passed Then user log in succefuly..................................................passed

testcase.classname: 03 User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: reset Password
testcase.system-out: And user click in login.....................................................passed When user writer Email......................................................passed And user click on link ForgetPassword.......................................passed And user Rewriter Email.....................................................passed And user click on Recover button............................................passed Then ensure the message of sending an email is found........................passed

testcase.classname: 05 Logged User could switch between currencies US-to_Euro
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: And user click in login.....................................................passed And user enter valid email and Password.....................................passed And user click on button log in.............................................passed When user change currency...................................................passed Then website prices should be with Eruo.....................................passed
